Empty.summary: Checks whether the given text is null, empty, or contains only whitespace characters.
Empty.returns: True if the text is null, empty, or whitespace only; otherwise, false.

HasNumbers.summary: Determines whether the given text contains any numeric digits.
HasNumbers.returns: True if the text contains one or more digits; otherwise, false.

ValidateInteger.summary: Validates whether the given text represents a valid integer number.
ValidateInteger.returns: True if the text contains digits only; otherwise, false.

ValidateFloat.summary: Validates whether the given text represents a valid floating-point number.
ValidateFloat.returns: True if the text is a valid decimal number; otherwise, false.

IsNumber.summary: Determines whether the given text represents a valid numeric value (integer or floating-point).
IsNumber.returns: True if the text is a valid number; otherwise, false.

IsValidPassword.summary: Validates whether the given password meets basic security requirements.
